thread.title_full: Vice President Predicts Unstoppable Rise for India | Education

author: Devdiscourse News Desk
title: Vice President Predicts Unstoppable Rise for India | Education
text: Vice President Predicts Unstoppable Rise for India Vice President Jagdeep Dhankhar highlighted Indiaâ€™s unstoppable rise and its recognition by global institutions during a lecture at NMIMS University. He emphasized the role of education in achieving equality and noted the nation's transformation over the past decade that has garnered international attention. [Devdiscourse News Desk](/devdiscourse-stories)| Mumbai | Updated: 12-07-2024 13:47 IST | Created: 12-07-2024 13:47 IST - Country: - India Vice President Jagdeep Dhankhar highlighted India's unstoppable rise and its recognition by global institutions during a lecture at NMIMS University. He emphasized that the nation's progress over the next five years would be like a rocket defying gravitational force. Dhankhar stressed that education plays a crucial role in achieving equality and is the most impactful transformational mechanism. He noted that while India was once considered a 'sleeping giant,' it is now a nation on the move, receiving accolades from international bodies. The Vice President underscored the country's rapid transformation in the past decade, which has led to global institutions seeking advice from India. (Disclaimer: With inputs from agencies.)
